response.overview: The series of short films “Geometry for Kids” in a light playful way tells kids about the basic concepts of the branch of mathematics - geometry, an ancient science and very necessary in life. Basic concepts of geometry will be explained to kids using simple examples, because in reality it is present everywhere.  In this final film, in a playful way, young viewers will remember many of the geometric concepts that they became acquainted with in previous issues of this series. Geometric paintings by the outstanding Dutch artist Maurits Escher were used.
response.title: Geometric Caprices
